title: Boku no Hero Academia 5th Season (My Hero Academia Season 5)
synopsis: UA Academy's Class 1-A has been the focus of a substantial amount of public attention due to the multiple villain attacks they have faced over the past school year. This attention has left Class 1-A's rivals, Class 1-B, feeling quite bitter. Desiring to prove their skills, they look forward to the opportunity that has been given to them: a set of mock battles between the students of each class.
related_anime: ['Boku no Hero Academia', 'Boku no Hero Academia 4th Season', 'Boku no Hero Academia 6th Season', "Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 3: World Heroes' Mission"]
